title: GM credits Trump for USA-Canada's 'political flair'
description: Bill Guerin, GM of the U.S. hockey team, said he would welcome a visit from President Trump and credits him for adding a "political flair" to the matchup vs. Canada.

title: Panthers re-sign QB Dalton to two-year contract
description: The Panthers and quarterback Andy Dalton reached agreement on a two-year, $8 million deal that includes $6 million guaranteed and has a max value of $10 million, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
author: David Newton

title: 'I was loving every minute, another 30 would have been amazing'
description: Goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel regrets not taking Bayern Munich to extra time after Celtic's 'heroic' Champions League performance.

title: Hamilton 'invigorated' by Ferrari move at F1 launch
description: Lewis Hamilton says he feels "so full of life" because "everything is new" at his first public event as a Ferrari driver.

title: First look! See all 10 new F1 2025 liveries, Hamilton in Ferrari red
description: All 10 Formula 1 teams revealed their 2025 liveries in a stunning show at The O2 in London - see them all here!

title: 'Full of life and energy' - Hamilton 'invigorated' for first Ferrari season
description: Lewis Hamilton says he is "invigorated" for his first campaign with Ferrari after making his first official public at an F1 event in the sport's season launch on Tuesday.

title: Panthers offseason preview: Focus can become building around Bryce Young
description: At least Carolina knows who their QB will be next season, allowing the team to prioritize plenty of holes after a 5-12 season.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Inter Miami and Kansas City might play the coldest soccer game ever. Will Messi?
description: Messi and Inter Miami may have no choice but to play through the frigid weather.
author: Yahoo Sports
